author: Jared Leith
comment: Needs a black background, not white, as on my LG G R wear when it saves from screen burn by moving the face about a bit every minute you notice the white around the edges and the clock stays white as well.
title: Nice but

author: Robert Jamieson
comment: The face looks unaligned with a strange white square boarder. (moto 360)
title: Would like it but.......
